memberdef.argsstring: (const rational &in, const rational &out, const TrackReference &track, Timeline::MovementMode mode)
memberdef.name: AddGhostFromNull

memberdef.argsstring: (rational movement, const QVector< TimelineViewGhostItem * > ghosts, bool prevent_overwriting)
memberdef.name: ValidateInTrimming

briefdescription.para: Validates Ghosts that are getting their in points trimmed.

detaileddescription.para: Assumes ghost->data() is a Block. Ensures no Ghost's in point becomes a negative timecode. Also ensures no Ghost's length becomes 0 or negative.

memberdef.argsstring: (rational movement, const QVector< TimelineViewGhostItem * > ghosts, bool prevent_overwriting)
memberdef.name: ValidateOutTrimming

briefdescription.para: Validates Ghosts that are getting their out points trimmed.

detaileddescription.para: Assumes ghost->data() is a Block. Ensures no Ghost's in point becomes a negative timecode. Also ensures no Ghost's length becomes 0 or negative.

briefdescription.para: Retrieve the QGraphicsItem at a particular scene position.

detaileddescription.para: Requires a float-based scene position. If you have a screen position, use GetScenePos() first to convert it to a scene position

briefdescription.para: Validates Ghosts that are moving horizontally (time-based)

detaileddescription.para: Validation is the process of ensuring that whatever movements the user is making are "valid" and "legal". This function's validation ensures that no Ghost's in point ends up in a negative timecode.

briefdescription.para: Validates Ghosts that are moving vertically (track-based)

detaileddescription.para: This function's validation ensures that no Ghost's track ends up in a negative (non-existent) track.

briefdescription.para: Snaps point start_point that is moving by movement to currently existing clips.
